summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirty-first Avenue South, from the north line of All Around View Addition, to the south line of the same addition, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of concrete walks, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2303 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
